title: Hide Spoilers: Media Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the mlb.tv app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I have turned hide spoilers on
AND I select a game to watch from the Games Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I cannot see any future scores or game data while viewing the game(ie milestones such as inning markers beyond the current position in the game)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I have turned hide spoilers on
AND I select a game to watch from the Home Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I cannot see any future scores or game data while viewing the game(ie milestones such as inning markers beyond the current position in the game)

title: Homepage
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB user is in MLB.TV App

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I land on the homepage
AND there is an active season currently
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I cannot see any scores or game data.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I land on the homepage
AND hide scores is enabled for the user
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will not be shown VOD Carousels with spoilers (Note that what is hidden is determined by the hideSpoilers element taken from https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com/api/video/v1/playlist. If unclear, look at this output to verify the correct carousels are hidden)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I land on the the homepage
AND hide scores is enabled for the user
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I will not be shown extra innings data for final games in the games carousel
AND I will not be shown extra innings data for final games in the featured game
